entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Alexandria
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:04 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Moose Creek Wells 10:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: 1.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 93 %
Dewpoint: 0.9°C
Wind: E 44 km/h gust 66 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow or rain. Temperature falling to minus 6 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow and blowing snow this afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 80 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 6 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 14 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 90. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 90 becoming south 30 gusting to 50 early in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 60%
